amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 116 of the bill which prohibits the National Park Service from carrying out boat inspections or safety checks on the Yukon River within the Yukon-Charley National Preserve in Alaska.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 116 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 237 (Roll no. 658).
